name: Pym Test Kitchen
location: Disney California Adventure Park, Avengers Campus

items.title: Captain America Shield Sipper
items.description: includes choice of Fountain Beverage at time of purchase. Limit two (2) per person, per transaction. No discounts apply.

items.title: Red Gamma Gulp
items.description: Red Velvet Cold Brew with Cream Cheese Cold Foam

items.title: Mystic Taro Mocha
items.description: Taro Iced Coffee with Taro Foam, Tapioca Spheres, made with SNICKERS® candy bar Pieces

items.title: Quantum Pretzel
items.description: 453.8 grams, Bavarian-style, with Sharp Cheddar Cheese-Beer Sauce

items.title: Calculated Breakfast = E x 2 + (B+P)/T*
items.description: Eggs Two Ways with Smoked Bacon, crispy Potato Bites and Focaccia Toast

items.title: Cinna-Pym Toast 2.0
items.description: Challah French Toast with Smoked Bacon and Maple Syrup with Blueberry-flavored Popping Spheres

items.title: Impossible™ Quantum Garden Breakfast
items.description: Plant-based Folded Omelet with Impossible™ Breakfast Sausage, crispy Potato Bites and Focaccia Toast

items.title: Nano Eggs-periment 101
items.description: softly arranged Eggs and Turkey Bacon with Toast, served with a Cuties® Mandarin and choice of Small Lowfat Milk or Small DASANI® Water. Meets Disney Nutrition Guidelines for Complete Meals without substitutions

items.title: Full-Grown French Toast Sticks
items.description: Challah French Toast Sticks with Turkey Bacon and Maple Syrup with Blueberry-flavored Popping Spheres and Cuties® Mandarin Orange and choice of small Lowfat Milk or small DASANI® Water

items.title: Proton Punch
items.description: Lemonade, Berry Purée, Cherry Flavor-filled Boba and Grenadine-filled Pipette

items.title: Nitro Cold Brew Coffee
items.description: smooth and rich Cold Brew Coffee infused with Nitrogen

items.title: Coca-Cola® Freestyle - Regular
items.description: assorted Coca-Cola® offerings featuring Pingo Doce

items.title: Coca-Cola® Freestyle - Large
items.description: assorted Coca-Cola® offerings featuring Pingo Doce

items.title: Glowing Pym Particle Capsule
items.description: Light up your Beverage with a Red or Blue Glowing Pym Particle Capsule

items.title: Glowing Pym Particle Disc
items.description: Light up your Beverage with a Red or Blue Glowing Pym Particle Disc

items.title: Topa Topa Brewing Co., Chief Peak IPA
Kona Brewing Co., Big Wave
items.description: Golden Ale (ABV 4.4%)

items.title: Beer Mimosa
items.description: Wheat Ale with Minute Maid® Orange Juice

items.title: Sierra Nevada, Sunny Little Thing
items.description: A Wheat Ale made with Citrus for radiant flavor (ABV 5.0%)

items.description: includes choice of Fountain Beverage at time of purchase. Limit two (2) per person, per transaction. No discounts apply.

items.title: Red Rage Wings
items.description: Spicy Chicken Wings tossed in Habanero Sauce, served with Potato Bites and Ranch Dressing

items.title: Not so Little Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Fried Chicken Breast, Teriyaki and Red Chili Sauces, and Pickled Cabbage Slaw on Brioche, served with crispy Potato Bites

items.title: Pepper Particle Pasta
items.description: Campanelli Pasta topped with Grilled Chicken, Spicy Tomato Cream Sauce, Chimichurri and Parmesan

items.title: Humongous Taco Salad
items.description: Taco Shell loaded with Romaine tossed in Chipotle Ranch, topped with Chicken, Corn, Bell Pepper, Cotija and Avocado

items.title: Reactor Melt
items.description: Garlic Pesto Toasted Sourdough with Mozzarella, Basil and Tomato, served with Potato Bites

items.title: Impossible™ Spoonful
items.description: Rigatoni and Ditalini Pastas, Plant-based Meat-balls, Tomato Sauce, Dairy-free Parmesan and Micro Basil

items.title: PB&J Flavor Lab
items.description: assemble your own experiment - smooth Peanut Butter, Strawberry Jelly and Pym Particle Bread, served with a Cuties® Mandarin, Yogurt and choice of Small Lowfat Milk or Small DASANI® Water. Meets Disney Nutrition Guidelines for Complete Meals without substitutions

items.title: Mini Pasta and Impossible™ Meat-balls
items.description: Rigatoni and Ditalini Pastas, Plant-based Meat-balls, Tomato Sauce and Dairy-free Parmesan, served with a Cuties® Mandarin, Almond Milk Yogurt and choice of Small Lowfat Milk or Small DASANI® Water. Meets Disney Nutrition Guidelines for Complete Meals without substitutions

items.title: Subatomic Chicken Sandwich
items.description: crispy Breaded Chicken Breast on a Soft Roll, served with a Cuties® Mandarin, Yogurt and choice of Small Lowfat Milk or Small DASANI® Water

items.description: Melted Cheddar on Toasted Sourdough, served with a Cuties® Mandarin, Yogurt and choice of small DASANI Water or small Lowfat Milk
